user_query: I'm planning a basketball-themed quiz night for my friends. Can you provide me with a specific game from the NBA? It would also be great if you could suggest some cocktail recipes that we can enjoy during the quiz.

TaskList.description: Retrieve an interesting and popular NBA game to feature during the quiz.
Gather details about the selected NBA game, including scores and key moments.
Collect cocktail recipes suitable for a quiz night atmosphere.
Create a quiz based on the retrieved NBA game and the cocktail recipes.
